scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && ls -la dist/
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/backend/src/assets/audio dist/backend/src/assets/6trece dist/backend/src/assets/images dist/backend/public/assets-optimized/image && cp -R ../src/assets/audio dist/backend/src/assets/audio && cp -R ../src/assets/6trece dist/backend/src/assets/6trece && cp -R ../src/assets/images dist/backend/src/assets/images && cp -R ../public/assets-optimized/image dist/backend/public/assets-optimized/image && ls -laR dist/backend/src/assets/6trece
